objective.description: Below is a structured view of my journey as a developer. It includes what I‚Äôve already accomplished, the modules I‚Äôm currently taking in a full stack bootcamp, and the goals I aim to achieve in the short and medium term.

cards.title: Completed
cards.description: Solid foundations gained via self-taught learning and hands-on personal projects.
highlights: Mastery of HTML and CSS for responsive websites
Basic use of Git and GitHub for version control
Strong JavaScript foundations and DOM manipulation
Knowledge of data structures and algorithms (ES6+)
Active participation in tech communities and personal projects

cards.title: In Progress
cards.description: Advanced modules of the full stack bootcamp, strengthening technical and teamwork skills.
highlights: Frontend development with React, Hooks, and Context API
Best practices with tokens, session management, and testing
Building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
Using MongoDB and SQL for relational and NoSQL databases
Implementing MVC architecture and JWT authentication

cards.title: Upcoming
cards.description: Focus on key technologies to scale real-world solutions and take on production-level challenges.
highlights: Developing fullstack MVPs using agile methodologies (SCRUM)
Setting up CI/CD environments with Docker and continuous integration
Web app performance optimization and security
Consuming external APIs and handling advanced async logic (EventLoop)
Preparing to contribute to open source projects

header.title: Shall we work together?
header.description: I‚Äôm open to new job opportunities or exciting collaborations. If you have a proposal, don‚Äôt hesitate to write me.

toast.error_message: Message must be at least 10 characters long.
toast.fail: An error occurred while sending the message.

1.title: 1. Information Collected
1.content: When you use the contact form on this site, the following personal data may be collected:
list: Subject and content of the message

2.title: 2. Purpose of Data Processing
2.content: The data collected is used exclusively to:
list: Follow up on possible collaborations, job opportunities or contact proposals
2.note: It will not be used for advertising purposes nor shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

3.title: 3. Data Protection
3.content: This site uses appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. Communication is encrypted via TLS (HTTPS).

4.title: 4. User Rights
4.note: You can exercise these rights by contacting the email address below.

5.title: 5. Data Retention
5.content: Data will be retained only as long as necessary to fulfill its purpose and will then be securely deleted.

6.title: 6. External Links
6.content: This site may contain links to other sites. We are not responsible for their privacy policies or content.

7.title: 7. Contact
7.content: For questions or to exercise your rights, you can write to:

info.prefix: You can also write to me directly at
